actions.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A004) as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment prohibits OPIC funding for manufacturing enterprises in foreign countries. \   As amended by the Manzullo amendment (A005), language was added which limits the prohibition to investments that would cause a reduction in U.S. manufacturing.
purpose: An amendment no. 6 printed in the Congressional Record. to prohibit OPIC funding for manufacturing enterprises in foreign countries.
